title: Swanky Luxury, Minutes to Downtown *Insane Views*
posting_body: *After prorating the 8 free weeks into the monthly rent you will be paying $1,281 / month.
That is almost unheard for this property!*
Check out this insane deal on a brand spanking new property in the heart of Central Austin.
This property is boasting walkability to some of Austins most fun & interesting restaurants, bars, coffee shops.
All within a short walk and an even shorter bike ride!

A few of the communities other most exciting features include a state-of-the-art 2,060-square-foot fitness center, theatre room with 70-inch+ LED TV and surround sound, outdoor sky deck with a insane view of downtown and a resort style swimming pool.
This apartment isn't going to stay on the market long so CALL or TEXT me today!!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
